conbody.p: WhatsApp is a globally recognized messaging application developed by Meta Platforms. It enables users to exchange text messages, voice notes, images, videos, documents, and location details with ease. The platform also supports voice and video calls, making it a comprehensive communication tool. With end-to-end encryption, WhatsApp ensures privacy and security for its users. Accessible on smartphones, desktops, and web browsers, it has become one of the most widely used communication apps worldwide, serving over 2 billion active users.
